dcterms:creator: Albert Haque
Boya Peng
Zelun Luo
Alexandre Alahi
Serena Yeung
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: The ITOP dataset contains depth images from top and front view. The training split and the test split consist of 40k and 10k images, respectively. The depth images display 15 videos of 20 actors in a constrained setting, recorded using two Axus Xtion Pro cameras. The 3D skeleton model consists of 15 joints.
dcterms:title: ITOP Dataset

dcterms:creator: Nicola Garau
Giulia Martinelli
Piotr Bródka
Niccolò Bisagno
Nicola Conci
dcterms:description: The PanopTOP31K dataset consists of 34k top-view and 34k front view images coming from video sequences of 24 different actors, available both in the RGB and depth domain, for a total of 68k images. The ground truth 3D skeleton consists of 19 joints.
dcterms:title: PanopTOP31K
